properties.name: spring.cloud.stream.artemis.binder.transport
properties.description: Transport to be used to connect to an Artemis server e.g. org.apache.activemq.artemis.core.remoting.impl.netty.NettyConnectorFactory

properties.name: spring.cloud.stream.artemis.binder.host
properties.description: Host of an Artemis server e.g. localhost

properties.name: spring.cloud.stream.artemis.binder.port
properties.description: Port of an Artemis server e.g. 61617
